MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY11 postcode area of Dunfermline. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 7:30pm due to a damaged underground cable on Fod Street, caused by a third party and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:05pm on Monday, 26 April 2021
